name: Random List Generator
description:
Awkward silence during talks?

Use this list randomiser to decide who will be speaking


Add users manually

Type in all names needed with line breaks.

Add them to list!


Add current users to list

Add active Figjam users by clicking ‘replace with current users’

*Replaces the input with current users.

*Only users on Figjam board is added. But you can add more manually


Click on the shuffle button to get a random order
